body.name: Camera for Photography, 4K Digital Camera Anti-Shake 48MP Compact Video Camera with 18X Digital Zoom, Travel Autofocus WiFi Vlogging Camera Point and Shoot Camera with 64GB TF Card, 2 Batteries
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 59 mins
features: 【 4K Camera with Auto Focus & Anti Shake 】- Our digital camera delivers 4K high-resolution video and clear image at 48MP without missing any details. The 4k camera also supports 18X digital zoom and built-in Flash. By just one-click you can take real autofocus and anti-shake photos. With this 4k camera, you can shoot stunning photos of people, landscapes, selfies and more! We also offer you a 32G TF card so that you can use it the moment you receive it. (Please note：dual charger is not included)

【 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 】- With this point and shoot digital cameras, you can view real-time images from the screen to facilitate your composition, allow you to produce more perfect photos. Also with 18x digital zoom, you can press the W/T button to zoom in or out while recording video and shooting stills to feel the beauty up close, which makes you act like a professional photographer!

【 Perfect Digital Camera for YouTube 】- The YouTube camera for vlogging can be used as webcam for live-streaming. Compact but powerful for its size, this small camera is great for keeping in your pocket on those occasions when you want to travel. The portable camera also features a simpler 360° dial for easy switching between different 8 modes, which can achieve unique and artistic shooting effects without the need to change lenses, meeting users' personalized and creative needs.

【 WiFi Fast Transfer Easy Sharing 】- Our digital cameras for photography has built-in WIFI, which can be used with a free smartphone app"DV Cam Plus" . Not only can it display the camera's shooting screen in real-time on your phone, but it also allows for easy browsing, transferring, and sharing of your photos and videos. You can upload your videos and photos to social media in real-time, capturing and sharing the beautiful moments of life.

【 Vlogging Camera for Beginners and Warm Service 】- This is easy to use for designed for beginners. Equipped with a hot shoe port allows you to external fill light, while setting up an external microphone interface and tripod socket, allowing you to freely match. This point and shoot digital camera is an excellent gift option for kids, teens, friends, and who wants to capture memorable moments. We offer a one-year warranty, if you have any questions, feel free to contact us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars suitable for beginners in child photography
reviews.reviewText: This is a 56-megapixel and 4K ultra-high-definition digital camera with a large 2.7-inch TFT LCD display that allows you to see the scenery clearly while shooting. It features up to 20x digital zoom, allowing you to capture even the tiniest things with ease. Supports SD flash memory cards up to 128 GB, allowing you to save more photos without worrying about storage save issues.In addition, face detection is a great feature that helps kids use this digital camera more easily while the built-in flash keeps photos bright enough while taking them.The camera is perfectly sized and lightweight, making it ideal for a child's hand.I would say this is a simple digital camera that has all the basic features in it and is suitable for beginners in child photography as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera to put it in the car. If there is a vehicle collision on the road, sometimes when the mobile phone camera cannot meet the needs, it can be used for on-site photo recording. For this need, the camera should not be too big, the smaller the better, so that it is easy to carry. This camera lens meets 1080P video or 56MP photos, which is already a pretty good configuration. Although it is small in size, it has configurations for functions such as anti-shake, time-lapse, and continuous shoot. It's a pocket-sized camera, but it fully meets all your daily shooting needs. Coupled with a very competitive price, it is a cost-effective product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The digital shoot camera has been a true companion on my photography journey. Its compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry around, ensuring that I never miss a moment worth capturing. The image quality is outstanding, producing sharp and vibrant photos with rich details, even in challenging lighting conditions. The various shooting modes and manual settings allow for creative flexibility, enabling me to experiment with different styles and techniques. I particularly appreciate the fast autofocus and responsive shutter, which ensure that I can capture fast-moving subjects with precision and clarity. The digital shoot camera's video capabilities are also impressive, delivering smooth and high-resolution footage for my videography needs. With its user-friendly interface and intuitive controls, even as a beginner photographer, I found it easy to navigate and customize settings to suit my preferences. Overall, this digital shoot camera has become an indispensable tool in my photography arsenal, providing exceptional performance and results that exceed my expectations. I highly recommend it to any photography enthusiast or professional looking for a reliable and feature-rich camera to capture their visual stories.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Default was too big to over look, poorly manufactured...
reviews.reviewText: Before taking the pic, the image bounces to/from the scene making focusing difficult and time consuming. 1/3 of the battery used up in 10 minutes and very difficult to open battery lid. Very disappointing as it is my 5th camera l've tried unsuccessfully with disappointments. Also the 32gb chip does not match the picture advertised...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No instructions. Won't charge.
reviews.reviewText: Must be plugged in to work so far. Has charged for an hour. Still nothing. Charging light is green when plugged in. No user manual came with the camera.I will wait a few hours and check again. Then I will try the other battery if it still does not work. I hope to change this to five stars if I can figure this out. Seems so perfect for what I need.Update:Amazon support rectified the battery issue. Thankful to be receiving a new battery and more. Above and beyond.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cameras for photography.
reviews.reviewText: I finally found the perfect cameras for photography, and it have exceeded all my expectations. These cameras are not only user-friendly but also incredibly versatile, making them suitable for beginners.I am beyond impressed with this 4K Digital Camera! The clarity of both photos and videos is outstanding, and the 18X Digital Zoom adds a whole new dimension to my shots. The included 32GB TF Card is a huge plus - no need to spend extra money on storage. The image quality is simply exceptional, capturing sharp details and vibrant colors that truly bring my subjects to life. Great value for the price, highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This digital camera features a 56MP image resolution and 1080P video resolution, ensuring good shooting quality. It has clear menu navigation and offers functions like stabilization, timer, slow motion, burst mode, motion detection, face detection, and selfie mode. It can also be used as a webcam, making it a versatile tool for video calls and live streaming. The rechargeable battery ensures continuous shooting without the need for frequent battery changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I find this camera to be excellent, and I am genuinely pleased with its performance. The high-resolution 4K capability allows me to capture incredibly detailed videos and images, which is precisely what I was looking for in a camera.The 64GB memory card provides ample storage space for my media, ensuring I can capture moments without worrying about running out of space. Additionally, the inclusion of two extra batteries and a charger is a real convenience, as it allows me to have extended shooting sessions without constantly worrying about the power running out.I like the camera's simplicity and ease of use. It offers straightforward controls and menus, which suits my preference for a no-fuss photography experience. The image and video quality are impressive, and I am genuinely satisfied with the results.
